analysis: Market analysis indicates positive momentum favoring buyers. RSI at 57.54 remains in neutral territory. Money Flow Index at 58.19 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD showing trend transition, awaiting confirmation. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias.

indicator_insights.ichimoku: Price above cloud components. Strong bullish structure, all systems aligned for longs.
